Ƙididdiga na yau da kullun na cutar coronavirus (COVID-19) ya nuna ayyukan da ke da alaƙa a cikin ƙasashe na Majalisar Turai / Ƙungiyar Kasashen Turai da Ƙasar Burtaniya wanda ya tabbatar da cewa, yayin da ake da alaƙa da ƙasashe, cutar COVID-19 tana ci gaba da ci gaba a duk ƙasashe.

A cewar nasarar daga Italiya, kasashe, asibitocin da asibitocin daidaitaccen lafiya na iya karɓar ƙarin aiki don ƙarin masu lafiya da suka shafi COVID-19 da suka buƙatar lafiya, da kuma asibitocin daidaitaccen lafiya.
A ranar 31 ga watan Disamba 2019, aka bayyana kungiyar cututtukan pneumonia da ainihin ainihin aƙalla a Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.

A ranar 9 ga watan Janairu 2020, China Center for Disease Control and Prevention ya bayyana abin da ya haifar da cutar a matsayin cutar coronavirus ta hanyar da aka yi la'akari da ita a yanzu a matsayin severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
Daga nan, cutar da ke fitarwa daga cutar SARS-CoV-2 ta kasance sunan cutar coronavirus (COVID-19).
Abubuwan da aka samu har yanzu sun nuna cewa kusan 80% na mutanen da suka samu COVID-19 suna da cutar da kyau, i.e. cutar jini da kuma pneumonia, kuma akwai yawa daga cikinsu da suka dawo.
A cikin 14% na ƙididdiga, COVID-19 ya zama cikakken al'ada wanda ke buƙatar ajiye a cikin gidan yari, yayin da 6% na ƙididdiga ke ƙarancin al'ada wanda ke buƙatar ajiye a cikin gidan yari.
Mace-mace na masu kula da cutar ta COVID-19 da ake kula da su a cikin asibiti tana da 4%.

A cikin wannan bincike, mu ne ke tattaunawa da tattalin arzikin COVID-19 a kowace kasar da ke cikin European Union/European Economic Area (EU/EEA) da kuma United Kingdom (UK) da kuma kiyayewa su da Hubei Province, China.
Kuma kuma muna ƙididdige adadin COVID-19 na yanzu a cikin kasashen EU/EEA da Birtaniya da kuma a Italiya a ranar 31 ga watan Janairu zuwa 15 ga watan Maris 2020.
COVID-19 a kasashen EU/EEA da Birtaniya
Bayan kasar Sin, COVID-19 ya ci gaba da yaduwa a fadin duniya kuma yanayin cutar COVID-19 a cikin ƙasashen duniya na yanzu yana daidaita da wannan ƙasa.
A ranar 11 ga Maris 2020, Shugaban Kasa na Majalisar Dinkin Duniya (WHO) ya tabbatar da cewa COVID-19 ya zama pandemiyar.
A cikin jaridar Eurosurveillance na 5 ga watan Maris 2020, Spiteri da sauransu sun bayyana a cikin jaridar 2020 na farko na COVID-19 a yankin Turai kamar yadda aka bayyana a cikin bayanan WHO.
A cikin EU/EEA, an tabbatar da na farko na biyu sun bayyana a Faransa a ranar 24 ga Janairu 2020 a cikin mutane da suka dawo daga Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.

A ranar 15 ga watan Maris na shekarar 2020, an gano COVID-19 a duk ƙasashen EU/EEA da ƙasar Burtaniya (UK), inda tsakanin ranar 31 ga Disamba 2019 da wannan ranar, an bayar da rahoton 39,768 da 1,727 mutuwa, tare da 17,750 da 1,441 daga Italiya kawai.
Samun adadin juna da adadin juna na COVID-19

A cikin European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC), adireshin COVID-19 da aka bayyana a kowace ƙasa a duniya, wanda aka samu daga kawai sassan hukumomin jama'a na ƙasashen da ke da alhakin su, hukumar lafiya ta ƙasashen da ke da alhakin su da kuma WHO, ana ƙara su kowace rana a 8:00 a.m.
An yi amfani da wannan bayanin don ayyana hanyoyin COVID-19 a cikin EU/EEA da kuma Burtaniya, da kuma karanta su zuwa wanda a Italiya.

Ƙara manufofin nazarin COVID-19 "wanda ake zargin" da "wanda ake tabbatarwa" yana da mahimmanci

A ranar 6 ga watan Fabrairu 2020, tawarar mu ta buga shawarar harkokin sa ido da maganin cutar 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV), da wannan shawarar ta bayyana nasarar mu da kuma ta kasance mai amfani ga yin amfani da wannan cutar a duniya.

Amma cutar coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) ita ce babbar cuta, yadda muna samun shawarar da kuma iliminmu ya dogara ne akan ayyukan karatun da ake yi da ayyukan amfani da shawara; don haka, ayyukan nazarin da ake yi da ayyukan amfani da shawara suna canzawa.

A cikin wannan rahoton, muka jawo ɗaya daga cikin ayyukan mu akan hukumar mu da kuma bayar da sabbin manufofin bincike na "wani abu" da "wanda aka tabbatar" kamar yadda aka bayyana a cikin Diagnosis da Manufofin Kula da COVID-19 (sabuwar ɗaya) wanda aka bayar da shi ta Hukumar Lafiya ta Jamhuriyar China.

A watan Disamba 2019, cutar 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) ta haifar da cutar, wacce a yanzu ake kira a matsayin cutar coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) kuma cutar tana da suna severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
A ranar 11 ga Maris 2020, WHO ya bayyana COVID-19 a matsayin pandemiyar.
A cikin yakin da suka yi da cutar SARS-CoV-2, tawagar mu ta shirya babban bayanin shawara da aka buga a yanar gizon Military Medical Research a ranar 06 ga watan Fabrairu 2020.
Ita ta samar da kyauwa sha'awa tun da aka buga ta.

Kamar yadda kuma COVID-19 babban cutar ce, tunaninmu da shawararmu ke ci gaba da karuwa a kan aikin karatun da ake yi da aikin amfani, don haka, aikin nazarin da ake yi da aikin amfani kuma ke ci gaba da karuwa.

Kamar yadda Bayanai da kuma Hanyoyin Kula da Kula da COVID-19 da aka buga ta Hukumar Lafiya ta Kasa ta Jamhuriyar China (http://www.nhc.gov.cn/), daga ranar 16 ga Janairu 2020 zuwa ranar 3 ga Maris 2020, ya buga jimillar takwas bugu da kuma yadda yadda an canza cikakken bayanai.

Bangladesh ta bayyana cewa an kashe mutane biyu a cikin kwanaki ɗaya saboda COVID-19, mafi girman kwanaki.
A ranar da ta gabata, Bangladesh ta tabbatar da cewa an kashe mutane biyu a ranar da ta gabata sakamakon COVID-19.
Wannan shine kashi mafi girma na mutuwa a rana daya sakamakon cutar.

A ranar da ta gabata, Bangladesh's Institute of Epidemiology, Disease Control and Research (IEDCR) ya bayyana adadin masu cutarwa da aka kiyasta wanda ya hada da 114 masu cutarwa masu aiki da kuma 33 masu dawowa da ke zaune a gida.
A cikin jimillar 17 mutuwa an nuna.
A taron bayyana labarai na yanar gizo, shugaban IEDCR, Dr Meerjady Sabrina Flora, ya ce mutanen da suka mutu sun hada da mata biyu da maza hudu.
Kamar yadda Dr Meerjady ya ce, biyu suna da shekaru 60 da ciki, biyu suna da shekaru 51 zuwa 60, kuma daya 41 zuwa 50.
Ta ce kuma biyu daga cikin mutanen da suka mutu suna daga Dhaka.

Akwai tsirrai da dama game da wani bangaren farko (wanda ake kira na farko) ina da asalin.
Karo na farko da ake sanin koronavirus ɗin da ya fara zama sanin ya fara ne a ranar 1 Disamba 2019 a Wuhan, Hubei, China.
A cikin wata, yawan cutar coronavirus a Hubei ya karu.

Wannan na iya zama saboda Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market, wanda kuma ya sayar da dabbobi masu rayuwa, kuma wani tsari ne cewa cutar ta fito ne daga ɗaya daga cikin wannan nau'in dabbobi; ko kuma, a cikin saƙon, tana da asalin zoonotic.
A ranar 30 ga Disamba, ƙungiyar ɗalibai a Wuhan Central Hospital suka bayyana ga abokan aikinsu cewa "SARS-like coronavirus".

Na biyar daga cikin doctarsu, ciki har da Li Wenliang, an yi watsi da su daga hukumar siyasa saboda yin labaran da ba a tabbatar da su ba, kuma wani, Ai Fen, an yi watsi da shi daga shugabanninsa saboda yin kira.
Ƙungiyar Lafiya ta Gwamnatin Wuhan ta ƙaddamar da sanarwar jama'a a ranar 31 Disamba kuma ta bayyana ga WHO.
An samar da Gidajen otal din ne domin matasa - yawancin baki zaka samu basu wuce shekaru ashirin ba- amma kuma sau da yawa ana samun matafiya tsofaffi a wajen.
A farkon da kuma tsakanin Janairu 2020, cutar ta fadawa zuwa yankuna sauran jihar Sin, tare da taimakon tafiyar shekarar Sin da kuma Wuhan shi ne babban tashar jirgin kasa da kuma tashar jirgin kasa.
A ranar 20 ga watan Janairu, kasar China ta bayyana kusan 140 wadanda suka shiga cikin ɗayan rana, ciki har da mutane biyu a Beijing da ɗaya a Shenzhen.

Ƙididdiga na hukuma da aka tabbatar ba da daɗewa ba ya nuna cewa a ranar 20 ga watan Janairu 2020, akwai mutane 6,174 da suka samu alamun cutar. A ranar 26 ga watan Maris 2020, Amurka ta yi nasara a China da Italiya tare da mafi girman yawan cututtukan da aka tabbatar da su a duniya. A ranar 9 ga watan Afrilu 2020, akwai kimanin 1.61 miliyan cututtuka da aka tabbatar da su a duniya; akwai kimanin 97,000 mutane da suka mutu da kuma kimanin 364,000 da suka samu nasarar samun rahoton.
Kimanin 200 ƙasashe da ƙasashen yanki sun sami aƙalla ɗaya a cikin aƙalla ɗaya.
A cikin cutar da ke cikin yankin Turai, ƙasashe da yawa a cikin yankin Schengen sun kiyaye ayyukan jama'a da kuma suka ƙirƙiri tsayayyun iyaka.

Ƙa'idodin ƙasa sun haɗa da ayyuka irin su karewa (wanda aka fi sani da hukuncin zaune a gida, hukuncin zaune a cikin gida, ko karewa) da hukuncin ƙarshe. A ranar 2 ga watan Afrilu, kusan 300 miliyan mutane, ko kusan kashi 90% na yawan jama'a, suna cikin karewa a Amurka, sama da 50 miliyan mutane suna cikin karewa a Filipin, kusan 59 miliyan mutane suna cikin karewa a Afirka ta Kudu, da 1.3 bilioni mutane suna cikin karewa a Indiya.
A ranar 26 ga watan Maris, mutane 1.7 bilioni a duniya suna cikin karfafa, wanda ya karu zuwa mutane 2.6 bilioni a ranar da ta biyo bayan wannan, kusan kashi uku na yawan jama'ar duniya.
An tabbatar da farko a cikin COVID-19 a ranar 1 Disamba 2019 a Wuhan; wani rahoton da ba a tabbatar da shi ba ya nuna cewa mafi ƙarancin ƙarshen shine ranar 17 Nuwamba.

A cikin wani lokacin da aka bayyana a matsayin "yawan karantawa mafi girma a tarihin ɗan adam", cordon sanitaire an sanar da shi a ranar 23 ga watan Janairu don ƙuntatawa a cikin da kuma da cikin Wuhan, wanda aka ƙara zuwa jimillar 15 birane a Hubei, wanda ya haifar da jimillar ƙasashen 57 miliyan.
Amfani da motocin kuɗi na ɗabiɓar ɗaya a birnin.
Bikin Shekara ta Sin (25 ga watan Janairu) an cire shi a wuraren da dama.
Hukumar kuma ta bayyana cewa za a gina wani asibiti na tsawon lokaci, Asibitin Huoshenshan, wanda aka kammala a cikin 10 rana.
Bayan haka aka gina wani asibiti, Asibitin Leishenshan, don ajiye masu cutarwa.
Wannan ya haɗa da asibitai da aka gina, kuma kasar China ta canza 14 cibiyoyin da ke cikin Wuhan, ciki har da wuraren taro da filin wasa, zuwa asibitai na tsawon lokaci.
Jami'o'i da makarantu a ƙasashen da suka shafi kuma an soke.
Yankuna na Hong Kong da Macau suka shigar da wasu ayyuka, musamman game da makarantu da jami'o'i.
An shigar da ayyukan aiki daga waje a yankunan da dama a kasar Sin.
Ƙa'idodin tafiye-tafiye sun haɗa a cikin da kusa da Hubei.
Kayan aikin jama'a an gyara shi, kuma cibiyoyin tarihi a duk China an yi wa su tsawon lokaci.

Gwamnatin kasar Sin ta goyi bayan kamfanoni da ayyukan gine-gine suka fara aiki a ranar 30 ga watan Maris, kuma ta bayar tabbacin kuɗi don kamfanoni. Majalisar Gwamnati ta tabbatar da ranar rantsuwa don fara da haɗin kai na mintuna uku na ƙasa a ranar 10:00 4 ga watan Afrilu, wanda ya ƙunshi Qingming Festival, amma gwamnatin ƙasa ta ga iyalai su yi aiki online a cikin aiki don hana haɓakar COVID-19 a cikin ƙarshe.
An tabbatar da cewa COVID-19 ya ƙara zuwa Koriya ta Kudu a ranar 20 ga watan Janairu 2020 daga Sin.
Ofishin harkokin lafiya na ƙasa ya bayyana ci gaba mai ƙarfi a cikin ƙara a ranar 20 ga watan Fabrairu, wanda aka ɗauka ne saboda taron a Daegu na ƙungiyar addini ta Shincheonji Church of Jesus.
Shincheonji devotees visiting Daegu from Wuhan were suspected to be the origin of the outbreak.
A ranar 22 ga watan Fabrairu, a cikin 9,336 masu karɓar addinin, 1,261 ko kusan 13% sun bayyana alamun. Jamhuriyar Koriya ta bayyana matsin lamba mafi girma a ranar 23 ga watan Fabrairu 2020.
A ranar 28 ga watan Fabrairu, sama da 2,000 mutane da aka tabbatar da cewa suna fama da cutar a kasar Koriya, ya zama 3,150 a ranar 29 ga watan Fabrairu.
Dukkanin rundunar sojoji ta Koriya ta Kudu an rufe su bayan an tabbatar da cewa sojojin uku suna da cutar.

Ayyukan da suka dace da suka dace sun haɗa da amfani da tsarin Bluetooth don nufin ajiye ci gaba na masu amfani da ƙirƙirar da suka dace.
A ranar 10 ga watan Afrilu 2020, Google da Apple sun bayyana cewa za su haɗa cikakken aiki don taimakawa wa ayyukan Bluetooth da ke da alaƙa da su cikin tsarin Android da iOS.
A kasar Sin, gwamnatin Sin, tare da Alipay, ta shigar da app wacce ke buƙatar mutane su yi imanin cewa suna da alaƙa da mutane da suka samu COVID-19.
Ana amfani da shi a cikin kusan 200 biranen China. A Singapore, ana amfani da app mai suna TraceTogether.

An haɗa wannan aiki ne ta ƙungiyar IT ta ƙasa, an ƙaddamar da shi a matsayin ayyukan da ake buƙata ga jama'a da za a bayar da shi ga gwamnati.Macedonia ta fara "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app don nuna ƙarancin ƙwayoyin cuta da za a bayar da shi ga hukumar lafiya.
An shirya aikin ne ta ma'aikatar sadarwa da fasaha da ma'aikatar lafiya.
A ranar 14 ga Afrilu, 2020, an yi la'akari da amincewar Google Play Store da Apple App Store.
